Title: Lollo Logistics Recruitment Notice
Text:
Position:
[Express Delivery Courier]

Requirements:
Age: No restrictions; candidates of all age groups are encouraged to apply.
Driving License: Must possess a valid driving license from any country.
Responsibilities: The ideal candidate will adhere to company standards, ensuring the safe, efficient, and accurate completion of daily collection and delivery tasks.

Work Location:
Candidates will be assigned to a nearby distribution point based on their preferences and the current availability at each distribution point.

Work Hours:
Duration: 9 hours per day, 5 days a week. Starting around 7 AM and concluding around 7PM, with approximately a 3-hour break at noon.
Overtime: Any work beyond these specified hours will be considered overtime and compensated at double the standard rate.

Salary and Benefits:
1. Earn per package with unlimited potential earnings.
2. The company provides personal safety insurance, transportation vehicles, accommodation, and specialized collection and delivery skills training (including but not limited to hazardous material identification, harmless treatment of pollutants, first aid, etc.). The company issues corresponding professional qualification certificates upon completion;
3. Triple salary on holidays;
4. Free supply of work unifroms throughout the year;
5. Personal safety protection will be provided for collection and delivery in dangerous zones (including but not limited to material support, armed support, dedicated escorts, etc.), with all expenses covered by the company.
